Context:
Classes begin on January 8, 2024, for the Winter 2024 term.

Hybrid delivery: Online/e-learning and no less than 40% and no more than 50% in-person delivery with active instructor presence/evaluation. The planned and required online components include technology enhanced learning experiences and equate to 1/2 of the instructional time that would typically be spent face-to-face. Asynchronous and modular online learning opportunities may be available (web-casts, chat sessions, team projects, etc.).

Not Available: Some programs or semesters are not being offered.

On Campus: All courses are fully in-person.

Online: All courses are fully online.

Contact Information:
- Phone number: 416-415-2000

- Email: ask.george@georgebrown.ca
- Social Media Hub: Visitor not provided with a link to the social media hub in the text.

Note: It is important to verify program delivery information by downloading the Excel version as some programs or semesters may not be listed in the text.
